We encountered several key challenges during this project:

  • ğŸ”§ Lack of Required Cleansing Tool: Our migration partner lacked the necessary data cleansing capabilities.
  • ğŸ’° Budget Constraints: We couldnâ€™t implement premium solutions like Informatica CDQ due to cost limitations. We needed to find affordable yet effective cleansing tools.
  • â° Tight Timeline: Leadership needed quick insights into existing data quality, creating deadline pressure.
  • ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Manual Processing: Identifying and fixing data quality issues manually was inefficient and time-intensive.
  • ğŸ“Š Excel Dependency: Our business teams relied heavily on Excel, which shaped our toolâ€™s design.

ğŸ› ï¸ Tool Description

The Data Cleansing Master Tool is a VBA-based solution that automates data quality management. Here are its key features:

  • ğŸ¤– Automated Data Cleansing: ğŸ¤– Automated Data Cleansing: Based on user input in the Config Sheet, the tool automatically finds and highlights data issues.
  • ğŸ¯ User-Friendly Interface: Simple navigation and intuitive controls make the tool easy to use.

  • âš™ï¸ Configurable Rules: Users can customize workbook names, column names, and rule details in the configuration sheet.

ğŸ“Š Data Quality Dimensions

The tool classifies data into key quality dimensions:

  • Completeness
  • Validity
  • Uniqueness
  • Consistency
  • Format

ğŸ“‹ Data Quality Rules

The tool includes comprehensive validation rules:

  • ğŸ“ Data Validation
    • Null values
    • Junk character
    • Valid values
    • Length Check
  • ğŸ” Advanced Checks
    • Valid Email ID Check
    • Valid Phone Number Check
    • Valid Date Check
    • Duplicate Checks
    • Wild Card
    • Other validation checks

ğŸ’« Benefits

  • ğŸ’° Significant Cost Savings: Avoided implementation costs of 109,406 KWD by developing an in-house solution instead of implementing Informatica
  • âš¡ Dramatic Time Reduction: Reduced processing time from 2.5 days to 2-3 minutes per dataset, representing a 99% improvement in efficiency
  • ğŸ” Enhanced Control: Developed and maintained 400+ rules in-house, ensuring complete control over data quality management without vendor dependency
  • ğŸ¨ Validation Error Details & Visual Priority System: An intuitive color-coding system helps users identify data quality issues at a glance. High-priority issues appear in red, medium-priority in orange, and low-priority in yellow. Each flagged item includes a validation error message to guide correction

ğŸ“ˆ Reporting & Analytics

All cleansing data is seamlessly integrated with Power BI dashboards, providing management with comprehensive data quality insights. This integration enables data-driven decision-making and continuous quality improvement.

A screenshot of the data quality dashboard is shown below

The Power BI dashboard displays metrics on data quality, with interactive visualizations enabling teams to quickly identify issues and track improvements across all quality dimensions.

ğŸ‰ Conclusion

The Data Cleansing Master Tool has significantly improved our data management capabilities. The challenges we overcame provided valuable lessons for future projects. For this project, I received an award from the CTO of Alshaya (picture attached below)
